lead_paragraph: 5:20 p.m. | Updated Added Sprint's introduction of a New York 4G service.
snippet: Clearwire, a wireless broadband company, began offering 4G wireless Internet in New York City and other areas across the United States.

headline.main: 4G Wireless Reaches the New York Area

abstract: Clearwire, a wireless broadband company, began offering 4G wireless Internet in New York City and other areas across the United States.
